dublin_core.dcvalue: Jane Mulumba, Country Director, IRC International Water and Sanitation Centre, Email: nabunnya@ircwash.org

M4W is a multiplatform initiative using computers and mobile phones to provide information on water points and management. The initiative aims to improve response to non-functional drinking water sources in rural areas in order to improve access to clean and safe water.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:01Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 m4w.pdf: 286101 bytes, checksum: 698fbb87809fccbebba7f7674241350a (MD5)
African Transparency and Technology Initiative, SNV Uganda, WaterAid in Uganda
Mobile Phones For Improved Access To Safe Water (M4W)
Monitoring and Evaluation, Data Collection and Reporting, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
